snippet.title: FFXV Multiplayer Expansion Comrades – Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
For More Information: https://goo.gl/vNMzwY

As told through Libertus Ostium – see the untold story of the Kingsglaive during the events of FINAL FANTASY XV.

And today, FINAL FANTASY XV arrives in a multiplayer experience!

Join in arms with surviving members of the Kingsglaive to create your own legend, work alongside comrades to restore the town of Lestallum, and battle against colossal beasts.

FINAL FANTASY XV MULTIPLAYER EXPANSION: COMRADES is available now for players who purchased FINAL FANTASY XV and the FINAL FANTASY XV Season Pass. The expansion can also be purchased separately from the Xbox Games Store or PlayStation®Store separately for $19.99 through the following links:
● Xbox Games Store - http://sqex.to/XboxFFXV 
● PlayStation®Store - http://sqex.to/PlayStationFFXV
